mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.course_name courseName, c.teacher_id as teacherId, c.term_id as termId, c.location as location, c.teaching_class_name as teachingClassName, e.create_time as createTime FROM campus_sys_course_enrollment e LEFT JOIN campus_sys_course c ON e.course_id = c.id WHERE e.student_id = #{studentId} AND e.deleted = 0 ORDER BY e.create_time DESC
